metadata.Title: CVE-2018-8885 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
screenresolution-mechanism in screen-resolution-extra 0.17.2 does not properly use the PolicyKit D-Bus API, which allows local users to bypass intended access restrictions by leveraging a race condition via a setuid or pkexec process that is mishandled in a PolicyKitService._check_permission call.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-8885` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

screen-resolution-extra - 0.17.1.1~14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: screen-resolution-extra package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.17.1.1~14.04.1').
